column31: but what exactly is climate change?  Greenhouse gases act like a blanket around Earth
column32: trapping energy in the atmosphere. Human activities
column33: especially burning fossil fuels for energy
column34: increase the  amount of greenhouse gases in our atmosphere and  cause the climate to warm. Climate is the typical or  average weather for an area. Climate change is any  change in average weather that lasts for a long period of  time

column40: and wildfires. All of these impacts  affect human health.
